code: @Override public ConditionOutcome getMatchOutcome(ConditionContext context, AnnotatedTypeMetadata metadata) {     ConditionMessage.Builder message = ConditionMessage.forCondition("HibernateEntityManager").     for (String className : CLASS_NAMES) {         if (ClassUtils.isPresent(className, context.getClassLoader())) {             return ConditionOutcome.match(message.found("class").items(Style.QUOTE, className)).         }     }     return ConditionOutcome.noMatch(message.didNotFind("class", "classes").items(Style.QUOTE, Arrays.asList(CLASS_NAMES))). }
